for_sales.sales_text: "John B" is a lovely Drascombe Driver, built in the late 1970s in GRP, all original. Similar to a Lugger, but with long keel and small bilge plates. She has an inboard and outboard engines. Dipping lug rig. All the usual gear including pumps, oars and sculling oar, sprayhood are included in the sale along with a two wheel solid trailer with docking arms and cockpit cover.
for_sales.summary: "John B" is a lovely Drascombe Driver, built in the late 1970s in GRP, all original, sale includes two-wheel trailer.

boat.full_description: 'John B' is a late production Drascombe Driver and is all original. Similar to the Lugger, she has a long keel and small bilge plates with inboard and outboard engines.
boat.name: John B
boat.short_description: 'John B' is a Drascombe Driver, with dipping lug rig, built in the mid 1970's.
